name: Natural Born Ninja - The Mini Vector Parkour Banzai Fun Run Jump Legends For Boys, Girls and Teenagers
name_original: Natural Born Ninja - The Mini Vector Parkour Banzai Fun Run Jump Legends For Boys, Girls and Teenagers
description:
Your destiny awaits in this truly epic endless runner game. You are the last Natural Born Ninja.

Journey the assassins training route spanning 5 stunningly hand painted oriental locations that will test your reflexes every step of the way. Battle against enemy guards, leap and somersault over weapons and avoid the fatal spinning shurikens.

Learn to rely on Ninja skills as you gain awesome power ups and begin to master your growing Sensei strengths. Your chase takes you along the night time rooftops dashing past ancient ruins, across temple island bridges and tests your stealth as you infiltrate the Shinobi Dojo.

With tons of achievements to earn, 3 unique characters, a host of special ninja powers and vehicles at your disposal, are you worthy of becoming the Master Sensei?

Now is your time. Follow your path. Fullfil your destiny
Superb Features:-

- One touch gameplay
- GameCenter Leaderboards
- 60 in game achievements
- Unlock 3 Unique Ninja characters each with different abilities
- 4 Awesome Power Ups
- Drive on Scooters
- 5 Immersive hand painted locations
- Spin the Wheel for mystery prizes
- Earn coins to buy power ups for your journey
- Defeat Enemy Assassin Guards
- Jump and spin over obstacles
- Random locations, never the same game play twice
- Cinematic sound track
